name: Just bawled my eyes out while watching Atonements. Please give me some similarly heartbreaking songs!
html:
Just bawled my eyes out while watching Atonements. Please give me some similarly heartbreaking songs!

Songs

  • Tears in Heaven - Eric Clapton
  • Bohemian Rhapsody - Queen
  • Someone Like You - Adele
  • Stairway to Heaven - Remaster - Led Zeppelin
  • Viva La Vida - Coldplay
  • Mad World - Gary Jules, Michael Andrews
★★★★☆
